article_text:
To register to vote

Today is the last day to register to vote in the California June 7 presidential primary.

Also on the ballot are a number of statewide and local offices.

To register, go to register...

article_metadata.author: Almendra  Carpizo

og.title: More Latinos registering to vote

twitter.title: More Latinos registering to vote
twitter.description: Today is the last day to register to vote.Among the groups seeing a rise in registration rates are Latinos.Among the groups helping register voters is El Concilio, a nonprofit group that has been around since 1968. It exists to improve the lives of Latinos in underserved communities in the Central Valley and specifically serves San Joaquin and Stanislaus counties.Jose Rodriguez, who has been at the helm of El Concilio since 1996, has seen an uptick in the number of people calling the
